title: 483 27 "Looking for the Answer! Fire Fist Ace Dies on the Battlefield!"Transliteration: "Kotae o Sagashite – Hiken no Ēsu Senjō ni Shisu" (Japanese:答えを探して 火拳のエース戦場に死す) Hiroaki Miyamoto Hirohiko Kamisaka January 16, 2011(2011-01-16)[31]
transformers_text: 483 27 Looking for the Answer Fire Fist Ace Dies on the Battlefield Transliteration Kota e o Saga shite Hike n no su Senj ni S his u Japanese Hiroaki Miyamoto Hiro hi ko Kami saka January 16 2011 2011 01 16 31 Aka in u's attack against Ace gives him only seconds to live Aka in u tries to attack Ace again but Jim bei blocks it and Marco freed from his handcuffs by Mr 3 arrives with Vista to assist him Gar p is angered by Aka in u's actions but Sengoku holds him down A dying Ace apologizes to Luffy for not letting him to be rescued properly and for not being able to see him achieve his dream He tells Luffy that he wanted to know whether someone like him deserved to be born Before Ace dies he thanks Luffy White beard and his crew mates for loving him despite who he is Ace's death shatters Luffy's spirit as he cries and screams in despair
tf_idf_text: look answer fire fist ace die battlefield transliteration kota saga shite hike senj japanese hiroaki miyamoto hiro kami saka january aka attack ace give second live aka try attack ace jim bei block marco free handcuff arrive vista assist gar anger aka action sengoku hold die ace apologizes luffy not let rescue properly not able see achieve dream tell luffy want know whether someone like deserve born ace die thanks luffy white beard crew mat love despite ace death shatters luffys spirit cry scream despair
